body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "add",
    "params": [
        {
            "data": [
                {
                    "description": "string",
                    "name": "SPOKE_VPN",
                    "position": "post-vdom-copy",
                    "provision": "disable",
                    "script": "config system settings
  set location-id $(bgp_loopback)
end
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
  edit "H1_ISP1"
    set interface "$(wan1)"
    set ike-version 2
    set transport udp
    set authmethod signature
    set certificate "SPOKES"
    set peertype any
    set keylife 28800
    set localid $(branch_id)
    set exchange-fgt-device-id enable
    set net-device enable
    set link-cost 0
    set proposal aes256gcm-prfsha256 aes256-sha256
    set idle-timeout enable
    set shared-idle-timeout enable
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set add-route disable
    set encapsulation none
    set exchange-ip-addr4 $(bgp_loopback)
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 11
    set remote-gw $(wan1_hub1)
    set dpd-retrycount 3
    set dpd-retryinterval 5
    set dpd on-idle    
    unset local-gw
    unset monitor
  next
end
config vpn ipsec phase2-interface
  edit "H1_ISP1"
    set phase1name "H1_ISP1"
    set proposal aes256gcm
    set keepalive enable
    set keylifeseconds 3600
  next
end
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
  edit "H1_ISP2"
    set interface "$(wan2)"
    set ike-version 2
    set transport udp
    set authmethod signature
    set certificate "SPOKES"
    set peertype any
    set keylife 28800
    set localid $(branch_id)
    set exchange-fgt-device-id enable
    set net-device enable
    set link-cost 0
    set proposal aes256gcm-prfsha256 aes256-sha256
    set idle-timeout enable
    set shared-idle-timeout enable
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set add-route disable
    set encapsulation none
    set exchange-ip-addr4 $(bgp_loopback)
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 12
    set remote-gw $(wan1_hub1)
    set dpd-retrycount 3
    set dpd-retryinterval 5
    set dpd on-idle    
    unset local-gw
    unset monitor
  next
end
config vpn ipsec phase2-interface
  edit "H1_ISP2"
    set phase1name "H1_ISP2"
    set proposal aes256gcm
    set keepalive enable
    set keylifeseconds 3600
  next
end
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
  edit "H2_ISP1"
    set interface "$(wan1)"
    set ike-version 2
    set transport udp
    set authmethod signature
    set certificate "SPOKES"
    set peertype any
    set keylife 28800
    set localid $(branch_id)
    set exchange-fgt-device-id enable
    set net-device enable
    set link-cost 0
    set proposal aes256gcm-prfsha256 aes256-sha256
    set idle-timeout enable
    set shared-idle-timeout enable
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set add-route disable
    set encapsulation none
    set exchange-ip-addr4 $(bgp_loopback)
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 21
    set remote-gw $(wan1_hub2)
    set dpd-retrycount 3
    set dpd-retryinterval 5
    set dpd on-idle    
    unset local-gw
    unset monitor
  next
end
config vpn ipsec phase2-interface
  edit "H2_ISP1"
    set phase1name "H2_ISP1"
    set proposal aes256gcm
    set keepalive enable
    set keylifeseconds 3600
  next
end
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
  edit "H2_ISP2"
    set interface "$(wan2)"
    set ike-version 2
    set transport udp
    set authmethod signature
    set certificate "SPOKES"
    set peertype any
    set keylife 28800
    set localid $(branch_id)
    set exchange-fgt-device-id enable
    set net-device enable
    set link-cost 0
    set proposal aes256gcm-prfsha256 aes256-sha256
    set idle-timeout enable
    set shared-idle-timeout enable
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set add-route disable
    set encapsulation none
    set exchange-ip-addr4 $(bgp_loopback)
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 22
    set remote-gw $(wan1_hub2)
    set dpd-retrycount 3
    set dpd-retryinterval 5
    set dpd on-idle    
    unset local-gw
    unset monitor
  next
end
config vpn ipsec phase2-interface
  edit "H2_ISP2"
    set phase1name "H2_ISP2"
    set proposal aes256gcm
    set keepalive enable
    set keylifeseconds 3600
  next
end
",
                    "type": "cli",
                    "variables": [
                        "bgp_loopback",
                        "branch_id",
                        "wan1",
                        "wan1_hub1",
                        "wan1_hub2",
                        "wan2"
                    ]
                }
            ],
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template"
        }
    ]
}

{
  "session": "{{session}}",
  "id": 1,
  "method": "add",
  "params": [
    {
      "data": [
        {
          "description": "string",
          "name": "SPOKE_GENERAL",
          "position": "post-vdom-copy",
          "provision": "disable",
          "script": "config system global
  set hostname BRANCH-$(branch_id)
end
config system settings
  set location-id $(bgp_loopback)
  set ike-tcp-port 10443
end
config system interface
  edit "$(wan1)"
    set mode dhcp
    set vrf 0
    unset egress-shaping-profile
    unset ingress-shaping-profile
    unset outbandwidth
    unset inbandwidth
    unset estimated-upstream-bandwidth 
    unset estimated-downstream-bandwidth 
    set role wan
    set allowaccess ping https fgfm ssh 
  next
end
config system interface
  edit "$(wan2)"
    set mode dhcp
    set vrf 0
    unset egress-shaping-profile
    unset ingress-shaping-profile
    unset outbandwidth
    unset inbandwidth
    unset estimated-upstream-bandwidth 
    unset estimated-downstream-bandwidth 
    set role wan
    set allowaccess ping https fgfm ssh 
  next
end
config system interface
  edit "port3"
    set mode static
    set ip 192.168.$(branch_id).1/24
    set vrf 0
    set dhcp-relay-service disable
    set role lan
    set device-identification enable
    set allowaccess ping https 
  next
end
config system interface
  edit "port4"
    set mode static
    set ip 10.254.254.2$(branch_id) 255.255.255.0
    set vrf 11
    set dhcp-relay-service disable
    set role lan
    set device-identification enable
    set allowaccess ping https ssh 
  next
end
config system interface
  edit "Lo-BGP"
    set vdom root
    set type loopback
    set vrf 0
    set role lan     
    set ip 10.200.1.$(branch_id)/32
    set allowaccess ping
  next
end
config system dhcp server
  edit 10
    set dns-service default
    set default-gateway 192.168.$(branch_id).1
    set netmask 255.255.255.0
    set interface port3
    config ip-range
      edit 1
        set start-ip 192.168.$(branch_id).10
        set end-ip 192.168.$(branch_id).100
      next
    end
  next
end
",
          "type": "cli",
          "variables": [
          "bgp_loopback",
          "branch_id",
          "wan1",
          "wan2"
        ]
        }
      ],
      "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template"
    }
  ]
}

{
  "session": "{{session}}",
  "id": 1,
  "method": "add",
  "params": [
    {
      "data": [
        {
          "description": "string",
          "name": "SPOKE_ROUTING",
          "position": "post-vdom-copy",
          "provision": "disable",
        "script": "config router aspath-list
  edit "SDWAN_AS"
    config rule
      purge
      edit 1
        set action permit
        set regexp "$(bgp_as)"
      next
      edit 2
        set action permit
        set regexp "$(bgp_as)"
      next
    end
  next
end
config router route-map
  edit "H1_TAG"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set set-tag 1
      next
    end
  next
  edit "H2_TAG"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set set-tag 2
      next
    end
  next
  edit "LAN_TAG"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set set-tag 100
      next
    end
  next
  edit "LAN_OUT"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set match-tag 100
      next
    end  
  next
end
config router bgp
  set as $(bgp_as)
  set router-id $(bgp_loopback)
  set keepalive-timer 15
  set holdtime-timer 45
  set ibgp-multipath enable
  set recursive-next-hop enable
  set tag-resolve-mode disable
  set graceful-restart enable
  config neighbor
    purge
    edit $(loopback_bgp_h1)
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set capability-graceful-restart enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set interface "Lo-BGP"
      set update-source "Lo-BGP"
      set connect-timer 1
      set remote-as $(bgp_as)
      unset route-map-in
      unset soft-reconfiguration-vpnv4
      unset capability-graceful-restart-vpnv4
      unset route-map-in-vpnv4
    next
    edit $(loopback_bgp_h2)
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set capability-graceful-restart enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set interface "Lo-BGP"
      set update-source "Lo-BGP"
      set connect-timer 1
      set remote-as $(bgp_as)
      unset route-map-in
      unset soft-reconfiguration-vpnv4
      unset capability-graceful-restart-vpnv4
      unset route-map-in-vpnv4
    next
  end
  config neighbor-range
    purge
  end
  config neighbor-group
    purge
  end
  config neighbor-group
    edit "DYN_SPOKES"
      set ebgp-enforce-multihop enable 
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set capability-graceful-restart enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set next-hop-self enable
      set remote-as-filter "SDWAN_AS"
      set interface "Lo-BGP"
      set update-source "Lo-BGP"
      set passive disable
      unset route-map-out-vpnv4
      set route-map-out "LAN_OUT"
      unset soft-reconfiguration-vpnv4
      unset capability-graceful-restart-vpnv4
    next
  end
  config neighbor-range
    edit 101
      set prefix $(bgp_as_subnet)
      set neighbor-group "DYN_SPOKES"
    next
  end  
  config network
    purge
    edit 111
      set prefix $(lan_subnet)
      set route-map "LAN_TAG"
    next
  end
  config vrf
    purge
  end
end",
          "type": "cli",
          "variables": [
          "bgp_as",
          "bgp_as_subnet",
          "bgp_loopback",
          "lan_subnet",
          "loopback_bgp_h1",
          "loopback_bgp_h2"
        ]
        }
      ],
      "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template"
    }
  ]
}

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "add",
    "params": [
        {
            "data": [
                {
                    "description": "string",
                    "name": "HUB1_VPN",
                    "position": "post-vdom-copy",
                    "provision": "disable",
                    "script": "config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
  edit "VPN1"
    set type dynamic
    set interface "port1"
    set ike-version 2
    set transport udp
    set authmethod signature
    set certificate "HUB"
    set peertype any
    set localid HUB1-1
    set exchange-fgt-device-id enable
    set proposal aes256gcm-prfsha256 aes256-sha256
    set auto-discovery-sender enable
    set add-route disable
    set encapsulation none
    set exchange-ip-addr4 $(bgp_loopback)
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 11
    set dpd-retrycount 2
    set dpd-retryinterval 5
    set dpd on-idle
    unset local-gw
  next
end
config vpn ipsec phase2-interface
  edit "VPN1"
    set phase1name "VPN1"
    set proposal aes256gcm
    set keepalive enable
  next
end
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
  edit "VPN2"
    set type dynamic
    set interface "port1"
    set ike-version 2
    set transport udp
    set authmethod signature
    set certificate "HUB"
    set peertype any
    set localid HUB1-2
    set exchange-fgt-device-id enable
    set proposal aes256gcm-prfsha256 aes256-sha256
    set auto-discovery-sender enable
    set add-route disable
    set encapsulation none
    set exchange-ip-addr4 $(bgp_loopback)
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 12
    set dpd-retrycount 2
    set dpd-retryinterval 5
    set dpd on-idle
    unset local-gw
  next
end
config vpn ipsec phase2-interface
  edit "VPN2"
    set phase1name "VPN2"
    set proposal aes256gcm
    set keepalive enable
  next
end",
                    "type": "cli",
                    "variables": [
                        "bgp_loopback"
                    ]
                }
            ],
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template"
        }
    ]
}

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "add",
    "params": [
        {
            "data": [
                {
                    "description": "string",
                    "name": "HUB1_GENERAL",
                    "position": "post-vdom-copy",
                    "provision": "disable",
                    "script": "config system global
  set hostname HUB1
end
config system settings
  set location-id $(bgp_loopback)
  set tcp-session-without-syn enable
  set ike-tcp-port 10443
end
config system interface
  edit "$(wan1)"
    set mode static
    set ip $(wan1_hub1) 255.255.255.0
    set vrf 0
    unset egress-shaping-profile
    unset ingress-shaping-profile
    unset outbandwidth
    unset inbandwidth
    unset estimated-upstream-bandwidth 
    unset estimated-downstream-bandwidth 
    set role wan
    set allowaccess ping https fgfm 
  next
end
config system interface
  edit "port3"
    set mode static
    set ip 192.168.251.1 255.255.255.0
    set vrf 0
    set dhcp-relay-service disable
    set role lan
    set device-identification enable
    set allowaccess ping https 
  next
end
config system interface
  edit "port4"
    set mode static
    set ip 10.254.254.101 255.255.255.0
    set vrf 11
    set dhcp-relay-service disable
    set role lan
    set device-identification enable
    set allowaccess ping https ssh 
  next
end
config system interface
  edit "Lo-BGP"
    set vdom root
    set type loopback
    set vrf 0
    set role lan    
    set ip $(bgp_loopback) 255.255.255.255
    set allowaccess ping
  next
end
config system interface
  edit "Lo-HC"
    set vdom root
    set type loopback
    set vrf 0
    set role lan     
    set ip $(loopback_bgp_hub_hc) 255.255.255.255
    set allowaccess ping
  next
end
config system dhcp server
  edit 10
    set interface "port3"
    set default-gateway 192.168.251.1
    set netmask 255.255.255.0
    set dns-service default
    config ip-range
      edit 1
        set start-ip 192.168.251.10
        set end-ip 192.168.251.100
      next
    end
  next
end
",
                    "type": "cli",
                    "variables": [
                        "bgp_loopback",
                        "loopback_bgp_hub_hc",
                        "wan1",
                        "wan1_hub1"
                    ]
                }
            ],
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template"
        }
    ]
}

{
  "session": "{{session}}",
  "id": 1,
  "method": "add",
  "params": [
    {
      "data": [
        {
          "description": "string",
          "name": "HUB1_ROUTING",
          "position": "post-vdom-copy",
          "provision": "disable",
        "script": "config router route-map
  edit "LOCAL_REGION"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set set-community "no-export"
        set set-tag 100
      next
    end
  next
  edit "LAN_TAG"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set set-tag 100
      next
    end
  next 
  edit "SPOKES_OUT"
    config rule
      edit 100
      next
    end
  next 
end
config router bgp
  set as $(bgp_as)
  set router-id $(bgp_loopback)
  set keepalive-timer 15
  set holdtime-timer 45
  set ibgp-multipath enable
  set ebgp-multipath enable
  set recursive-next-hop enable
  set recursive-inherit-priority enable
  set graceful-restart enable
  config neighbor-group
    edit "SPOKES"
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set capability-graceful-restart enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set next-hop-self enable
      set remote-as $(bgp_as)
      set interface "Lo-BGP"
      set update-source "Lo-BGP"
      unset route-reflector-client-vpnv4
      set route-reflector-client disable
      unset route-map-out-vpnv4
      set route-map-out "SPOKES_OUT"          
      unset soft-reconfiguration-vpnv4
      unset capability-graceful-restart-vpnv4
    next
  end
  config neighbor-range
    edit 101
      set prefix 10.200.1.0/24
      set neighbor-group "SPOKES"
    next
  end
  config aggregate-address
    edit 111
      set prefix 192.168.0.0/16
    next
  end
  config network
    edit 102
      set prefix 10.200.0.0/24
      set route-map "LOCAL_REGION"
    next  
    edit 111
      set prefix 192.168.251.0/24
      set route-map "LAN_TAG"
    next
  end
end
config router policy
  purge
end
config router static
  edit 11
    set dst 0.0.0.0/0
    set device port4
    set gateway 10.254.254.254
  next
end
",
          "type": "cli",
          "variables": [
          "bgp_as",
          "bgp_loopback"
        ]
        }
      ],
      "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template"
    }
  ]
}

        set start-ip 192.168.252.10

  next
end

      ],
      "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template"
    }
  ]
}

{
  "session": "{{session}}",
  "id": 1,
  "method": "add",
  "params": [
    {
      "data": [
        {
          "description": "string",
          "name": "HUB2_ROUTING",
          "position": "post-vdom-copy",
          "provision": "disable",
        "script": "config router route-map
  edit "LOCAL_REGION"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set set-community "no-export"
        set set-tag 100
      next
    end
  next
  edit "LAN_TAG"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set set-tag 100
      next
    end
  next 
  edit "SPOKES_OUT"
    config rule
      edit 100
      next
    end
  next 
end
config router bgp
  set as $(bgp_as)
  set router-id $(bgp_loopback)
  set keepalive-timer 15
  set holdtime-timer 45
  set ibgp-multipath enable
  set ebgp-multipath enable
  set recursive-next-hop enable
  set recursive-inherit-priority enable
  set graceful-restart enable
  config neighbor-group
    edit "SPOKES"
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set capability-graceful-restart enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set next-hop-self enable
      set remote-as $(bgp_as)
      set interface "Lo-BGP"
      set update-source "Lo-BGP"
      unset route-reflector-client-vpnv4
      set route-reflector-client disable
      unset route-map-out-vpnv4
      set route-map-out "SPOKES_OUT"          
      unset soft-reconfiguration-vpnv4
      unset capability-graceful-restart-vpnv4
    next
  end
  config neighbor-range
    edit 101
      set prefix 10.200.1.0/24
      set neighbor-group "SPOKES"
    next
  end
  config aggregate-address
    edit 111
      set prefix 192.168.0.0/16
    next
  end
  config network
    edit 102
      set prefix 10.200.0.0/24
      set route-map "LOCAL_REGION"
    next  
    edit 111
      set prefix 192.168.252.0/24
      set route-map "LAN_TAG"
    next
  end
end
config router policy
  purge
end
config router static
  edit 11
    set dst 0.0.0.0/0
    set device port4
    set gateway 10.254.254.254
  next
end
",
          "type": "cli",
          "variables": [
          "bgp_as",
          "bgp_loopback"
        ]
        }
      ],
      "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template"
    }
  ]
}
